skills.name: BRAWL
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• Deal Additional Magic Damage to targets that have Mark, Curse, or Permadeath.

skills.name: FINAL TOUCH
desc: • Steal all Beneficial Effects from the enemy, including Golden Effects.
• Transfer all Negative Effects from you to the enemy.

skills.name: HIT JOB
desc: • Marks, Curses, and Permadeaths a random enemy for 1 turn at the start of each turn..
